Mike Clark wrote:

> 
> On Aug 23, 2004, at 4:52 PM, Timothy N. Jones wrote:
> 
>  > Is anyone aware of a server-side mock/stub/whatever store and/or
>  > transport for JavaMail?  I'd like to develop some unit tests for my
>  > client-side code that could run even if a mail server was not running.
>  > Something like the DSML JNDI provider which I use for LDAP testing
>  > would
>  > be ideal.
> 
> Coincidentally, I just posted a blog on how I tested JavaMail:
> 
>    http://www.clarkware.com/cgi/blosxom/2004/08/23#DumbsterDiving
